timeline.author: pop4959

timeline.message: Move hex color processing into its own helper

Pretend hex codes are invalid on < 1.16

Users can't be hurt by what they don't know!

Apply suggestions from code review

Co-authored-by: pop4959 <pop4959@gmail.com>
Make use of ADULT_ENEMY Enemy type

timeline.bodyText:
Shouldn't this just be enemy? Not sure why this needs a new enum. (btw piglin is apparently hostile by default, so it should probably be set as enemy, my bad)

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                HOGLIN("Hoglin", Enemies.ADULT_ENEMY, "HOGLIN"),
          
          
            
                PIGLIN("Piglin", Enemies.ADULT_ENEMY, "PIGLIN"),
          
          
            
                HOGLIN("Hoglin", Enemies.ENEMY, "HOGLIN"),
          
          
            
                PIGLIN("Piglin", Enemies.ENEMY, "PIGLIN"),
timeline.author: pop4959

timeline.bodyText: Name can't have a space in it, also this is basically a duplicate of PIGZOMB, cause they are both exactly the same mob (except for texture). I intentionally didn't add a new one because people can just continue using pigzombie.
timeline.author: pop4959
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -24,6 +24,7 @@
     HORSE("Horse", Enemies.FRIENDLY, EntityType.HORSE),
     PIG("Pig", Enemies.FRIENDLY, EntityType.PIG),
     PIGZOMB("PigZombie", Enemies.NEUTRAL, MobCompat.ZOMBIFIED_PIGLIN),
+    ZOMBIFIED_PIGLIN("Zombified Piglin", Enemies.NEUTRAL, MobCompat.ZOMBIFIED_PIGLIN),
